thread.title: Hoda Kotb has found the love of her life: A baby girl!
thread.title_full: Hoda Kotb has found the love of her life: A baby girl!

author: Sara McGinnis
title: Hoda Kotb has found the love of her life: A baby girl!
text:
by Sara McGinnis posted in Celebrities Welcome to parenthood, Hoda Kotb! Big baby news was shared on Today Tuesday morning, when the 52-year-old anchor announced she's now mom to a baby girl named Haley Joy Kotb. Emotions were running high when Hoda called in to tell her co-workers about her adoption news. Take a look... That moment... Read...

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
